commit_scope: Add continuous hosted task continuation: when execution finishes with no open tasks, auto-seed next work from specs/ideas by ROI and auto-run follow-up on Railway deployments.
evidence_refs: cd api && pytest -q tests/test_agent_execute_endpoint.py -k "continuous_autofill or seed_next_tasks_falls_back"
cd api && ruff check app/services/agent_execution_task_flow.py tests/test_agent_execute_endpoint.py

e2e_validation.expected_behavior_delta: Hosted execution automatically seeds next tasks from open specs or ideas when queue is empty, and Railway deployments auto-run seeded follow-up tasks to maintain execution continuity.
test_flows: execute task completes and triggers continuous autofill when no pending/running/needs_decision tasks exist
autofill prefers spec implementation gaps before idea-derived tasks
autofill does not trigger when open tasks are already present
